value:
Once upon a time, I wished to save
the world. I never aspired to anything
as grand as being a "Hero," though...

I've had friends and compatriots who
fought alongside me, but...none of
them ever truly understood me.$k$pIn that sense, I suppose I've always
been alone.

Looks like someone's working hard
again today. Don't worry, I'm certain
all your efforts will pay off one day.

Care to join me for a stroll outside?
It's a beautiful day, so I'm sure it'll
be quite pleasant.

Ow... Heh, looks like I'm still not used
to all the bumps and bruises that
come with having this body.

You must be $Nu.$k$pHere, a message for you from
$Nf.
So this is what I'm capable of...
I'm stronger now! How lovely.

That was a bit... How do I put this?
Bad.

For me? Heh, guess this means I'll
have to rise to the occasion.

My name is... No, actually, forget it.$k$pRegardless, I am a being who exists
on the edge of dreams and reality.
You may call me Arval.

Summoning Heroes, military affairs,
daily chores... You sure are a hard
worker, $Nu.$k$pI wish a certain someone would learn
a thing or two from you.$k$pBeing able to feel the breeze like
this is nice, and the view is nothing
to scoff at either.$k$pFrom the merchants in the market
to the children playing in the plaza,
I can see the whole town from here.$k$pWhen I see you working so hard to
protect all of them, it... It's like my
heart begins to ache terribly.$k$pI have already perished twice. I am
outside the cycle.$k$pTo put it simply, I'm something like a
remnant. Still, even I have my uses.$k$pIf you would permit it, I would like
to continue fighting alongside you.$k$pPerhaps the two of us can create a
future where people live in peace,
without fear of gods or devils.
Flee!
Reclaim what is ours!
You will not escape!
Useless.
Is this the end?
It is strange for me to take form in this way.
Heh. You never fail to pique my interest.
History will always be written by the victors...
My partner in destiny. We fight together... We live together... Truly irreplaceable.
What is your home like? Tell me everything.
Summoning Heroes from other worlds, and using them to fight your battles for you... How efficient.
Thanks to you, my time here has been well spent.
Very well.
What is it?
Shall we go?
